DOC.brief_title: Determining Levels D10 Phenanthrene Tetraol Smokers ' Urine
DOC.detailed_description: Forty apparently healthy smoker non smoker ( 20 male , 20 female ) recruit advertise Twin Cities area . This do Tobacco Use Research Center . They screen phone call , invite come orientation session consent obtain . Pregnant smoker exclude . They visit clinic weekly 2 month monthly 4 month total 6 month participation . At visit drink 5 ml 50:50 ethanol : water contain 10 ug [ D10 ] phenanthrene . They collect 24h urine return clinic . The urine analyzed [ D10 ] phenanthrene tetraol . The goal study determine longitudinal stability amount [ D10 ] phenanthrene-tetraol urine .
